bill.summary: 4/30/1996--Passed House amended. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to charge a rental fee for all ski area permits on National Forest System lands. Establishes a rental charge formula for permits issued pursuant to the National Forest Ski Area Permit Act of 1986. Grants permittees under the Act of March 4, 1915, and the Act of June 4, 1897, the option of using such formula or the calculations pursuant to such Acts. Requires periodic reports regarding such permit formula's return of fair market value rentals to the United States. Withdraws ski areas from the operation of mining and mineral and geothermal leasing laws.
